channel.title: [pi]Voule auto restarter, need help![pi]
channel.description: Hello everyone, i just set up an auto restarter on my vps for my server and when it restarts it just dcs everyone, and has [b]press any key to continue...[/b] in the run.bat box, can anyone help??? cause it never restarts!?
